name: vscode-spotless-maven
description: Format your source files using Spotless via Maven

spotlessMaven.useMvnd.description: Use mvnd instead of mvn for faster formatting. Requires mvnd to be installed and present on your PATH, or specified via spotlessMaven.mvndPath. This is VERY experimental, your results may vary.

spotlessMaven.mvnPath.description: Path to the mvn executable to use. Leave blank to find in PATH.

spotlessMaven.mvndPath.description: Path to the mvnd executable to use. Leave blank to find in PATH.

scripts.compile: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: pnpm run check-types && pnpm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile-tests && pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
